dt: {bc}a theatrical role of a dignified or somber character
{bc}a character in a story or play who opposes the hero {bc}{sx|villain||}
{bc}one blamed for a particular evil or difficulty {bc}{sx|villain||}
{bc}someone or something influential, serious, or important

shortdef: a theatrical role of a dignified or somber character; also : an actor playing such a role
a character in a story or play who opposes the hero : villain
